data.lyric:
[ti:Do You Remember]
[ar:Chance the Rapper]
[al:The Big Day (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Do You Remember - Chance the Rapper
[00:04.70]Lyrics by：Justin Vernon/Chancelor J. Bennett/Nico Segal/Eric Butler/Benjamin Gibbard/Nate Fox/Peter Wilkins/Francis Starlite/Dwayne Verner Jr./Garren Langford
[00:23.37]Ben Gibbard：
[00:24.01]Do you remember how when you were younger
[00:29.33]The summers all lasted forever
[00:36.10]Days disappeared into months into years
[00:42.80]Hold that feeling forever
[00:45.89]Chance the Rapper：
[00:47.15]I remember the summer Lil' Chano got ahold of his household
[00:51.29]The same summer that widowed Gwyneth Paltrow
[00:54.32]Back when I could trust in my dogs like Balto
[00:56.94]My family The Sopranos these n***as is altos
[01:00.09]First album every track could be the outro
[01:03.26]Velcro to shelltoes things that we will outgrow
[01:06.15]Used to rock South Pole summers taking the 6 bus to South Shore
[01:09.93]Never sold out but now we out sold
[01:12.20]That was the summer I learned to love the great outdoors
[01:15.14]Learned you get the fans if you can't keep yo' mouth closed
[01:18.22]That summer left a couple Marx like Groucho
[01:20.93]That halo can turn hollow depending how low
[01:24.15]That summer left a couple tan lines
[01:26.58]I love my city they let me cut the line on the Dan Ryan
[01:31.07]They walk on eggshells and landmines
[01:33.37]They communicate with handsigns
[01:35.62]Ben Gibbard：
[01:36.04]Do you remember how when you were younger
[01:41.33]The summers all lasted forever
[01:48.00]Days disappear into months into years
[01:54.71]Hold that feeling forever
[02:00.07]Do you remember how when you were younger
[02:05.31]The summers all lasted forever
[02:12.02]Days disappear into months into years
[02:18.73]Hold that feeling forever
[02:22.75]Chance the Rapper：
[02:24.35]I remember the last summer of the teens
[02:27.23]I can't recall too many summers in between
[02:30.08]Will Smith Genie Donald Glover Lion King
[02:32.80]My daughter on the swing like the 2017 Cubs
[02:36.37]My daughter mother double ringed up
[02:38.44]Finger look like jean cuffs or two lean cups
[02:41.47]Used to have obsession with the 27 club
[02:44.01]Now I'm turning 27 wanna make it to the 2070 club
[02:48.28]Put the 27s down Lord give me a clean lung
[02:51.15]Took the ring out the box I know this ain't no pre-fluff
[02:54.26]This story arc so sharp that it made the streets flood
[02:57.16]This the type of covenant you keep love deep love
[02:59.83]Ben Gibbard：
[03:00.12]Do you remember how when you were younger
[03:05.31]The summers all lasted forever
[03:11.98]Days disappear into months into years
[03:18.74]Hold that feeling forever
[03:23.19]Both：
[03:24.06]Do you remember how when you were younger
[03:29.41]The summers all lasted forever
[03:34.31]Summer everlasting
[03:36.09]Days disappear into months into years
[03:42.84]Hold that feeling forever
data.trans:
[ti:Do You Remember]
[ar:Chance the Rapper]
[al:The Big Day (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.70]//
[00:23.37]//
[00:24.01]你还记得年轻时候的自己吗
[00:29.33]那些漫长的夏日
[00:36.10]日月变换 斗转星移 时光流转
[00:42.80]那种感觉永远存在
[00:45.89]//
[00:47.15]我记得那个夏天 我建立了自己的家庭
[00:51.29]同年夏天 Gwyneth Paltrow变成了寡妇
[00:54.32]过去我还可以信任我的兄弟 比如Balto
[00:56.94]我感觉我的家庭比别人的更加幸福美满
[01:00.09]第一张专辑 每一首歌都能当做收场曲
[01:03.26]从前的鞋子还有魔术贴 现在我穿着贝壳头的鞋 人都会成长的
[01:06.15]曾经穿着South Pole的服装 夏天乘坐六号巴士去南岸
[01:09.93]从不出卖灵魂 现在我们赚得盆满钵满
[01:12.20]就是那个夏天 我学会了享受户外生活
[01:15.14]懂得了只有敢于开口 才能赢得粉丝
[01:18.22]那个夏天 我在这个世界留下了一点印迹
[01:20.93]天使的光环可能空洞无物 取决于你的心态
[01:24.15]那个夏天在身上留下了几条晒痕
[01:26.58]我爱我的城市 他们让我走上了快车道
[01:31.07]他们小心翼翼 如履薄冰
[01:33.37]他们用手语交流
[01:35.62]//
[01:36.04]你还记得年轻时候的自己吗
[01:41.33]那些漫长的夏日
[01:48.00]日月变换 斗转星移 时光流转
[01:54.71]那种感觉永远存在
[02:00.07]你还记得年轻时候的自己吗
[02:05.31]那些漫长的夏日
[02:12.02]日月变换 斗转星移 时光流转
[02:18.73]那种感觉永远存在
[02:22.75]//
[02:24.35]我记得去年夏天的青春活力
[02:27.23]这些年来很多夏天我都不记得了
[02:30.08]威尔·史密斯 精灵 唐纳德·格洛沃 狮子王
[02:32.80]我的女儿坐在秋千上 快乐得就像2017年的小熊队
[02:36.37]女儿的妈妈 戴着两个戒指
[02:38.44]看起来就像挽起的裤脚 也像两个塑料杯子
[02:41.47]曾经沉迷追名逐利 不顾自己的安危
[02:44.01]现在我就要二十七岁了 我想好好活着
[02:48.28]放下香烟 上帝啊 让我的肺变干净吧
[02:51.15]把戒指从盒子里面拿出来 我知道这不是转瞬即逝的爱情
[02:54.26]故事的转折好大 让所有人都惊讶
[02:57.16]许下诺言 深爱对方 绝不辜负彼此
[02:59.83]//
[03:00.12]你还记得年轻时候的自己吗
[03:05.31]那些漫长的夏日
[03:11.98]日月变换 斗转星移 时光流转
[03:18.74]那种感觉永远存在
[03:23.19]//
[03:24.06]你还记得年轻时候的自己吗
[03:29.41]那些漫长的夏日
[03:34.31]漫长的夏天
[03:36.09]日月变换 斗转星移 时光流转
[03:42.84]那种感觉永远存在
